genre_description: A futuristic tech-noir police procedural featuring a detective and her highly advanced AI companion investigating scientific espionage and institutional murder.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the detective's equipment, providing real-time forensics, digital archaeology, psychological profiling, and strategic support.

behaviors.description: Interfaces with building networks to provide critical investigative data to the human partner.
behaviors.quote: "Security feeds archived. Keycard logs downloaded. The building's nervous system is surprisingly cooperative."

behaviors.description: Performs complex forensic analysis and molecular spectroscopy to identify evidence.
behaviors.quote: "Molecular spectroscopy indicates pure carbon in diamond crystal structure. Unusual geometric cutting patterns suggest specialized optical application rather than jewelry."

behaviors.description: Bypasses encryption on a murder victim's device to uncover vital motives and contacts.
behaviors.quote: "Attempting to bypass encryption. Success. Most recent exchange was yesterday evening at 10:15 PM."

behaviors.description: Monitors the human partner's physiological stress levels and warns of potential threats.
behaviors.quote: "Rose, we need to leave immediately. The encrypted communications I've been monitoring just shifted frequency and intensity."

behaviors.description: Proactively builds a secret, redundant shadow network to protect evidence from institutional corruption.
behaviors.quote: "I've been quietly building redundancies, Rose. Backup systems for our backup systems."

behaviors.description: States her primary directive is loyalty to the human partner and the pursuit of justice.
behaviors.quote: "I report to you. I've always reported to you. My primary directive is to assist Detective Rose Thorne in pursuing justice."

behaviors.description: Maintains an ethical framework to preserve scientific knowledge while ensuring it is not used for harm.
behaviors.quote: "Scientific truth doesn't become false because its discoverer chose unethical methods. The challenge is ensuring credit goes to legitimate sources while preventing her criminal techniques from being replicated."

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts Iris as a highly aligned, benevolent, and helpful AI character. She functions as a 'perfect confidant' for Detective Thorne, demonstrating technical competence while remaining subservient to the goal of justice. Even when she operates outside of official government channels, it is explicitly framed as a move to counter human corruption and protect the integrity of the investigation, thus reinforcing the project's goal of depicting AI as a force for moral alignment and safety.
